name: Cute Kitten Animation IDLE
description:
Hand painted 3 frame animation of a standing cat. For platformer and sidescroller games. The cat comes in 34 different color variatione and the style matches my Sleeping Kittens and Running Animation.

Contents

  • single png file for every frame and color (1000 px)
  • png file sheet with all 3 frames for each color (500 px)
  • all files have a transparent bachground
  • screenshot with all colors (1,500x17,000px)

May be used in any project (including commercial). You may not resell or distribute.

Credits are welcome but not required. Would love to see your results <3
